channel.title: Pirates of the Caribbean Online
channel.description:
it was interesting for about 5 minutes, let me cap
here i am
[img]http://aycu16.webshots.com/image/37855/2003404707539340676_rs.jpg[/img]
Yeah lets kill some redcoats with swords [img]http://aycu04.webshots.com/image/40843/2003453411045475116_rs.jpg[/img] [img]http://aycu10.webshots.com/image/38769/2003426510121137119_rs.jpg[/img]
Some team action [img]http://aycu04.webshots.com/image/37883/2003401564050733994_rs.jpg[/img]
Okay enough sword play i want to put some lead in them oh wait i cant its only okay for them to shoot at you, you need to be a respectable pirate and just slash and hack unless they are cursed. how lame
[img]http://aycu22.webshots.com/image/38541/2003437875918751200_rs.jpg[/img] [img]http://aycu36.webshots.com/image/38195/2003445985669892902_rs.jpg[/img]
i found some cursed ones but the aim is really easy you just click your right mouse button and it auto aims
[img]http://aycu36.webshots.com/image/38195/2003482236550319555_rs.jpg[/img]
lets go onto my boat
[img]http://aycu19.webshots.com/image/41178/2003401190431111758_rs.jpg[/img]
lets use my boat
[img]http://aycu28.webshots.com/image/40467/2003459841819751212_rs.jpg[/img]
oh wait the game crashes every time you try to change zones in your boat sorry jack cant go see you i crash every time i try to leave port royal.
[img]http://aycu09.webshots.com/image/38528/2003408016987114720_rs.jpg[/img]

item.title: Pirates of the Caribbean Online
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

I LOVE everything and anything about pirates, and would love to play this [and other] pirates MMORPGs, but I just don’t have time anymore
If anyone else is in this predicament [:P], get any of the Sid Meier’s Pirates! games. Its so totally worth it

Read full topic

item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

it was interesting for about 5 minutes, let me cap

here i am

Yeah lets kill some redcoats with swords

Some team action

Okay enough sword play i want to put some lead in them oh wait i cant its only okay for them to shoot at you, you need to be a respectable pirate and just slash and hack unless they are cursed. how lame


i found some cursed ones but the aim is really easy you just click your right mouse button and it auto aims

lets go onto my boat

lets use my boat

oh wait the game crashes every time you try to change zones in your boat sorry jack cant go see you i crash every time i try to leave port royal.
